full_summary:
## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

### Title in English and French

*   RFSO Mechanical & Electrical Engineering Services (English)
*   Services de génie mécanique et électrique (French)

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** cb-326-89192124
*   **Amendment Number:** 9
*   **Solicitation Number:** 24-58068
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-06-12
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-30T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-30

### Procurement Overview

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) is inviting consulting firms with expertise in Electrical and Mechanical Engineering to submit proposals for Standing Offers. The selected consultants shall provide a range of services for NRC engineering projects across Canada.

### Service Description and Requirements

The selected consultants shall provide services as identified in the Required Services (RS) section for NRC engineering projects across Canada. The contractor shall possess expertise in mechanical and electrical engineering services, specifically with experience in:

*   Mechanical Engineering: Design and construction of mechanical systems and equipment.
*   Electrical Engineering: Design and construction of electrical systems and equipment.

### Tender Process and Evaluation Criteria

The RFSO will be awarded based on the following criteria:

*   **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** The contract will be awarded to bidders who meet the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other relevant trade agreements.

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name:** Andrew Jefferson
*   **Contact Email:** andrew.jefferson@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
*   **Contact Address:** 1200 Montreal Rd, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada
